header.name: chaos/preprocessor/generics/is_type.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that determines if a is a certain type.

macro.abstract: The macro determines if its second argument is of the type specified by its first argument.

usage.param: The type to be tested against.

macro.para: If g is of type type, this macro expands to 1. Otherwise, it expands to 0.
